participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Determined and hard-working, Emily has a creative side and loves to find ways to relax in her free time.
participant_1.background: I'll be watching wrestling with my boyfriend. I am determined to work hard and be the best that I can be, despite my circumstances. I like to relax and eat watermelon on the weekend. I enjoy running at night. I'd like to build a soundproof practice room for my guitar.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Curious and sociable, Jake enjoys exploring new interests and sharing experiences with friends.
participant_2.background: I like to stay active and learn new things in my free time. I love watching Game of Thrones. I enjoy the Food Network and HGTV while I'm on my diet. I'm a foodie who lives far from my family but loves to eat at restaurants. I love to listen to rap music on YouTube and read about my favorite charities on their websites.

content.text: Not much, just finished watching game of thrones.
It was pretty good! I'm kind of sad that it's over.
Yeah, I know what you mean. I've been catching up on it recently.
Oh cool! What season are you on?
Yeah, I'm really enjoying it so far.
I like a lot of different shows, but my favorites are probably game of thrones, the walking dead, and breaking bad.
Oh cool, I like those too! What about movies?
I like a lot of different movies too, but my favorites are probably the lord of the rings trilogy, the hunger games series, and star wars.
Oh cool, I like those too! We should watch some movies together sometime.
